pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Handling Extraction of Features from Time Series // Consolidates and calculates different sets of time-series features from multiple 'R' and 'Python' packages including 'Rcatch22' Henderson, T. (2021) doi:10.5281/zenodo.5546815, 'feasts' O'Hara-Wild, M., Hyndman, R., and Wang, E. (2021) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=feasts, 'tsfeatures' Hyndman, R., Kang, Y., Montero-Manso, P., Talagala, T., Wang, E., Yang, Y., and O'Hara-Wild, M. (2020) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tsfeatures, 'tsfresh' Christ, M., Braun, N., Neuffer, J., and Kempa-Liehr A.W. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.neucom.2018.03.067, 'TSFEL' Barandas, M., et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.softx.2020.100456, and 'Kats' Facebook Infrastructure Data Science (2021) https://facebookresearch.github.io/Kats/. Provides a standardised workflow from feature calculation to feature processing, machine learning classification procedures, and the production of statistical graphics.
